title: Denys Kostyshyn
text:
Denys Ruslanovych Kostyshyn (; born 31 August 1997) is a professional Ukrainian <a href="football%20%28association%29">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">striker</a> who plays for <a href="FC%20Oleksandriya">Oleksandriya</a> in the <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League">Ukrainian Premier League</a>.
Career.
Kostyshyn is a product of the sports school FC Dynamo Kyiv, but in August 2014 he signed a contract with another Ukrainian club FC Dnipro.
He made his debut for FC Dnipro in the match against <a href="FC%20Volyn%20Lutsk">FC Volyn Lutsk</a> on 30 April 2017 in the <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League">Ukrainian Premier League</a>.
Personal life.
Denys is a son of Ukrainian retired football player and current coach <a href="Ruslan%20Kostyshyn">Ruslan Kostyshyn</a>. His younger brother Danylo is also a footballer. Now Denys has relationship with Yelyzaveta Vasylenko, actor of the Ukrainian School TV series.
